name: Rangamati
description: Rangamati is the administrative headquarters of Rangamati Hill District in the Chittagong Hill Tracts of Bangladesh

name: New York City
description: New York, often called New York City to distinguish it from New York State, or NYC for short, is the most populous city in the United States

name: Manali
description: Manali is a high-altitude Himalayan resort town in Indiaâ€™s northern Himachal Pradesh state. It has a reputation as a backpacking center

name: Pahalgam
description: Pahalgam is a hill station in the north Indian state of Jammu and Kashmir. Mountain trails run northeast to Amarnath Cave

name: Cox Bazar
description: It is famous mostly for its long natural sandy beach. It is located 150 km (93 mi) south of the city of Chittagong

name: Darjeeling
description: Darjeeling is a town in India's West Bengal state, in the Himalayan foothills. Once a summer resort for the British Raj elite
